column5: Hey guys, hope everyone had a great holliday! Just getting back into the swing of things now, and thought I'd check in here and post a few pic's. The first couple are my 3 year old daughter Riley, and 3 month old son Brendan    The last pic is myself with one of many steelhead caught on a recent trip to Pennsylvania  Cheers!
nice steel man!! love the erie tribs
Very cute kids!!!  Great lookin Steelie too!  I've been trying to hook into some of those for the past two weeks....as a newbie...nothing yet, but seeing pics motivates me more!
